Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Rosecrest Street, just north of the Southwest Observational Post.
Room.LongDescription: You are near the southwestern corner of the city, which is marked by the Southwest Observational Station, located south of Golden Dolphin Way. On the east, you can see a small store with a plaque which reads "Dryfus' Elephant Leather Works." Elephant leather is one of the strongest forms of leather available, but also very heavy. It tends to be more comfortable for thieves and assassins than metallic armors. Although mages may use elephant leather, it tends to be very heavy and uncomfortable for these people.
